title: Re: Star Wars Episode III : Revenge Of The Sith
content:
Me and my friends are catching the movie after school on the 20th. Man I dont know if I can resist the temptation of playing the episode 3 game because I heard it was good and its made by the collective (guys who made indy & the emperors tomb) but would spoil the movie for me.

And as for seeing episode 3 without seeing 1 or 2 you would probably be lost since the movie would no doubt relate to the 1st two heavily most likely. You should watch the first two episodes since they arnt bad as people say they are. They are just not as good as the classic Trilogy.

title: re:
content: Just saw the movie and it was amazing. The best of the prequels too. It did show that Anikan can be brutal when he is on the dark side which earned the movie its pg-13 so be warned for younger audiences. The movie still have some parts that could of been better but was an improvement over the last two prequels. Oh and best of all: Jar Jar doesnt say a single word in the movie! title: Re: Star Wars Episode III : Revenge Of The Sith
content:
I watched the first 15 minutes of Episode II when it aired on Aussie tv a couple of weeks ago, but turned it off cause I was so sick of Hayden Christensen's poor acting. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-barf.gif[/img]

Sci-Fi and "battle scenes" bore me to tears cause there's very little "drama" involved. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-rolleyes.gif[/img]

EDIT : Oh, and for those interested, George Lucas is making a guest appearance on The O.C. I guess viewers can assume why he'd make an appearance on the show. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-cheeky.gif[/img] [img]http://www.geocities.com/miniopolis/soul.txt[/img]

content: Episode II sucks. It's the worst Star Wars ever. You shouldn't watched it even that far. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-cheeky.gif[/img] You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!

title: Re: Star Wars Episode III : Revenge Of The Sith
content:
I finally saw Episode III last night. The dialogue was horrible, and so was almost all of the acting (I've seen in-game cutscenes with better acting), but I did enjoy the movie. It was fun, although it wasn't exactly good. 4-6 trump it easily, but it was better than the other two prequels. It captured the feel of the originals a little better.________________
